name: Project Stealth (itch) (Team13: ProjectS)
description:
Your objective is to infiltrate a secret military facility and take it down from the inside. You will have to maneuver through the compound, completing puzzles and avoiding drones so that you can get to the main server network undetected.

You will need to find your way through the facility, completing tasks and using things throughout the environment to help you gain access to different areas.

Control Scheme:

  • Move : WASD
  • Look Around : Move Mouse
  • Jump : Spacebar
  • Crouch/Slide : Left Ctrl
  • Sprint : Left Shift
  • Interact : E
  • Pause Game/Show Hint: Esc
  • Toggle flashlight : T
  • Fire hack missile : F

Warning:
The game will take a few seconds to load once you click on play.
